row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_ENVIRONMENT@WINDOWS
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_COMMON_OPTIONS
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_IP# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_IP_OPTION# = &UC4RB_AWS_IP# :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_IP_OPTION# = '-a &UC4RB_AWS_ALLOC_ID#' :ENDIF
Write-Host Releasing Elastic IP address..
$output = java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute $env:EC2_HOME\bin\ec2-release-address.cmd &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# &UC4RB_IP_OPTION#
$result = $output | select-string -pattern ^ADDRESS -caseSensitive
if (![bool]($result)) { Write-Host Failed to release address $error = [string]::join("`n", $output) Write-Host $error exit 1 }
Write-Host $result Write-Host "`nSuccessfully release address"
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS

row.pre_process: :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.PREPARE_JOB :IF &UC4RB_AWS_IP# = "" : IF &UC4RB_AWS_ALLOC_ID# = "" : PRINT 'Missing input parameter. Either IP Address or Allocation ID need to be set' : EXIT 1 : ENDIF :ENDIF

row.post_process:
:SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "ADDRESS*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1)
! Extract the delimiter character from this line, usually the tab character : SET &tab# = STR_CUT(&output_line#, 8, 1) : SET &output_line# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, 9) ! Replace the tab character with single space to easier to split : SET &output_line# = STR_SUB(&output_line#, &tab#, " ")
: SET &UC4RB_OUT_IP# = STR_TRIM(&output_line#) : PRINT 'Output Elastic IP address: &UC4RB_OUT_IP#' : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_IP#, , "WORKFLOW"
:ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#
